replies.body:
> We reorder the scoreboard so you don’t have to.

> Games drafted in New Champ Select will automatically order the scoreboard by role (top, jungle, mid, marksman, support).

Sometimes, it is the small things in life which make you the happiest.
Finally. I would do this every game anyway, but I'd get so tilted by streamers that didn't do it.
You say that like they actually hit tab for more than half a second at a time... {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

ohh nice. I missed that one.  also, the basic attack lock in doesn't sound like a big deal but it could be really nice... i think.

I never really thought about it but I sometimes try to get a last hit but I click away too soon and my champ only starts to do the attack animation but doesn't finish and then I miss the cs.  this would help with that right?
Kappa
That's not irony, that's a coincidence.
That's not a coincidence; that's a government conspiracy.
It's not a conspiracy, it's a grassroots movement.
It's not delivery its Digiorno
Thats not a movement, THATS MY WIFE!
It's not a moon, it's a space station.
This aint a scene its an arms race
It's not a boulder, It's a rock {{champion:54}}
Nunu 95% slow!?  It'll be just like in my dreams when I try to run but I don't seem to go anywhere

Think {{champion:412}} 's box.  It's a 99% slow, but diminishing returns make it effectively (wild guess) more like 60-70, meaning {{champion:20}} 's  should be nearly identical by the end (keep in mind it starts at 50% and works up).
Nah, movement speed minimum is hardcapped at 110. So Nunu would slow people to 110 MS.
Dong zhu, bu xu zou
"Freeze! Don't move"

Hey everybody,

I'm the dude who wrote this patch note. Unfortunately, I goofed.

This feature is coming, but not in Patch 6.20. We didn't get QA signoff until too late in the patch, and somewhere along the line our product team and our comms team miscommunicated.

While I've delivered a lot of bad news before (nobody likes it when their champion loses 5 AD), I'm really sorry to be the bearer of this bad news.
Like you all, I am excited to see this in game, and I look forward to enjoying it with you when it goes to live. This feature will be on PBE soon, and we intend to ship it with the next patch.

EDIT: As an apology, I have attached this drawing of Vayne. I'm uh...not an artist.

http://imgur.com/0Lhf2wP
Which feature? The scoreboard thing?
Yes, the scoreboard thing - [he copy pasted that comment from reddit.](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/55utzy/patch_620_notes/d8dujnr)
Disenchant those project cores and get yourself that sweet sweet 2 orange essance{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

It adds up.

Or at least, it would if it didn't take so long to disenchant them one by one. 

by one...

by one...

{{summoner:3}}  I still have 80 left. This is ridiculous.
Please Rito, just convert them for us instead of deleting them, or add a "Disenchant all" option.
I feel your pain.  I spent 30 minutes disenchanting 200 cores.

when a rioter complains about a feature that isnt in their own game

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Scoreboard Reordering: "But maybe I liked trying to guess whether it was Darius or Gangplank playing support for the enemy team."
Actually yeah, unless people swap roles in champ select this takes away the guessing game when they run flex picks. Good catch Luigi

not really, if they are Support it will reorder them to the bottom of the Scoreboard. That is all, it doesn't mean they will actually go Support (in which case you would need to reorder it). You still need to guess whether it is Darius or Gangplank because they can easily switch roles after the game has started.

Lol he was talking about if someone picked a champion like kennen who could go top AND mid, the automatic order of the scoreboard shows what role kennen is in. Yeah they COULD lane swap, but thats not very common.
scoreboard reordering.. nice!

These notes are obviously incomplete. 
WHERE IS STAR GUARDIAN URGOT?
Nothing but a joke, and is never happening.
No part of me was joking in any way.
"when did nunu get a snare?"
I kind of feel like they went beyond what was necessary here. 70-80% max would have been strong. 95% is... well, a bit like driving behind my grandmother. She died 3 years ago.
95% doesn't actually slow by 95%. There's a soft cap on slows. Just like how Thresh's 99% slow works.
They finally order the scoreboard for us now PogChamp

{{champion:99}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:78}}: Starlight Power, MAKE UP!

{{champion:222}}: Star blah blah blah... CAN WE GET A MOVE ON?

{{champion:99}}: Jinx, [you have to say the whole phrase in order to transform.](http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/ByThePowerOfGrayskull) Did you even read the contract that you signed?

{{champion:222}}: No, I don't care about all this legal magical mumbo jumbo, I just want to blow stuff up! 

{{champion:78}}: Just save it for the Void, okay?

{{champion:40}}: And don't get yourself blown up, or worse.

{{champion:222}}: Fine, whatever... :(

Later...

{{champion:90}}: The Star Guardians. How nice to finally meet you guys. Too bad it's the last time we'll ever meet!

{{champion:31}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:161}} : RAWR!

{{champion:99}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:78}}: In the name of the First Star, we will punish you!

{{champion:222}}: TAKE THIS!

Jinx runs forward, with Kuro in gun form, firing rockets at everything in front of her. She suddenly stops when the ground starts shaking, looking panicked. Cracks in the floor open up beneath her, with large spikes shooting up out of them, sending Jinx straight up into the air.

{{champion:31}}: *CHOMP!*

{{champion:161}}: ======={{champion:222}}===========

{{champion:117}}: JINX!

{{champion:40}}: Can't say we didn't warn her...

I have seen enough erotic material of Far East origins
To predict the possible outcomes of this predicament.
